name: COVID19LOINCValueSetForInfluenzaVirusAAndBSARSCoronavirusAndSARSCoronavirus2AntigenPanel
title: COVID19 LOINC Value Set for Influenza Virus A and B, SARS Coronavirus, and SARS Coronavirus 2 Antigen Panel
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains terms related to panels containing results for the detection of SARS-CoV, SARS-CoV-2 (COVID-19), and influenza virus A & B antigens in respiratory specimens by rapid immunoassay.),(Data Element Scope: ),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes panels containing results for the detection of SARS-CoV, SARS-CoV-2 (COVID-19), and influenza virus A & B antigens in respiratory specimens by rapid immunoassay.),(Exclusion Criteria: Excludes individual components of panels.)

concept.display: Influenza virus A and B and SARS-CoV+SARS-CoV-2 (COVID-19) Ag panel - Upper respiratory specimen by Rapid immunoassay

contains.display: Influenza virus A and B and SARS-CoV+SARS-CoV-2 (COVID-19) Ag panel - Upper respiratory specimen by Rapid immunoassay
